net.hudup.core.data

Class DatasetUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.DatasetUtil

  • public final class DatasetUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class, called dataset utility, provides utility methods processing on Dataset such as loading dataset and saving dataset. In current implementation, dataset utility gives very few utility methods.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Detail

      • loadDataset

        public static final Dataset loadDataset(DataConfig config)
        Loading (reading, parsing) dataset from specified configuration. Actually, this method calls the method DatasetParserRemoteTask.parse(DataConfig) of dataset parser. Note, DatasetParser is one of main interface responsible for reading and parsing coarse data such as CSV file, Excel file, database table into Dataset.
        Parameters:
        config - specified configuration.
        Returns:
        Dataset loaded from specified configuration.
